title: A Late Night Chat with a Parakeet
description: Have you ever wished you could converse with an animal? Well, it seems that Hattie MacGruder has. This third grader, who has been accused of lying, is going to tell you all about what happened. She is even going to let you read her diary to make sure that you know the truth. This is a very funny book, told by Hattie herself, that children will surely enjoy reading.
highFrequencyWords: absolute, babbling, disease, funeral, gypsy, parakeet, partially, sassing, ventriloquism
